trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个 Windows 工具栏。

trans-unit.source: Although <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> replaces and adds functionality to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" /> control of previous versions, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" /> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: 尽管 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 替换了早期版本的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" /> 控件并添加了功能；但是也可选择保留 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" /> 以备向后兼容和将来使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> controls are used to display <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls that can appear as a standard button, a toggle-style button, or a drop-down style button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> 控件用于显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>可以显示为一个标准按钮，切换式按钮或下拉列表样式按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: You can assign images to the buttons by creating an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>, assigning it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ImageList%2A> property of the toolbar, and assigning the image index value to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.ImageIndex%2A> property each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过创建分配为的按钮图像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>，将其分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ImageList%2A>的工具栏上，并将分配到的映像索引值的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.ImageIndex%2A>属性每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>。

trans-unit.source: You can then assign text to be displayed underneath or to the right of the image by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Text%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以指派要通过设置显示下方或图像的右侧文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Text%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A> property of the toolbar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance.Flat> to give the toolbar and its buttons a flat appearance.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A>到工具栏的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance.Flat>赋予工具栏和其按钮平面的外观。

trans-unit.source: As the mouse pointer moves over the buttons, their appearance changes to three-dimensional.
trans-unit.target: 为鼠标指针移过的按钮，他们对三维的外观更改。

trans-unit.source: Toolbar buttons can be divided into logical groups by using separators.
trans-unit.target: 可使用分隔符将工具栏按钮划分成多个逻辑组。

trans-unit.source: A separator is a toolbar button with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Style%2A> property set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`.
trans-unit.target: 分隔符是与工具栏按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Style%2A>属性设置为`ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`。

trans-unit.source: Button separators appear as lines rather than spaces between the buttons when the toolbar has a flat appearance.
trans-unit.target: 按钮分隔符显示为线，而不是当该工具栏具有平面外观时，按钮之间的空格。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance.Normal>, the toolbar buttons appear raised and three-dimensional.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance.Normal>，工具栏按钮将出现引发和三维。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonSize%2A> property, all buttons in the tool bar are restricted to the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonSize%2A>属性外，在工具栏中的所有按钮都都限制为指定的大小。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the buttons adjust their size depending on their content, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonSize%2A> property returns the initial size of the largest button.
trans-unit.target: 否则，这些按钮调整其大小，具体取决于其内容与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonSize%2A>属性返回的最大的按钮的初始大小。

trans-unit.source: To create a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls to display on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>, add the buttons individually by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Insert%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>控件以显示有关<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>，通过使用单独添加按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Insert%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>和三个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form.
trans-unit.target: 工具栏按钮分配给按钮集合，集合将分配到工具栏，而工具栏添加到窗体。

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick> event of the toolbar, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs> is evaluated, and the appropriate dialog box opened.
trans-unit.target: 上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick>事件工具栏上，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs>计算的值，并打开相应的对话框。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SaveFileDialog>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> have been created.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SaveFileDialog>，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>已创建。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A newly created toolbar control is empty; add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的工具栏控件为空;添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>控件通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>和三个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form.
trans-unit.target: 工具栏按钮分配给按钮集合，集合将分配到工具栏，而工具栏添加到窗体。

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick> event of the toolbar, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs> is evaluated, and the appropriate dialog box opened.
trans-unit.target: 上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick>事件工具栏上，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs>计算的值，并打开相应的对话框。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SaveFileDialog>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> have been created.
trans-unit.target: 此代码需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SaveFileDialog>，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog>已创建。

trans-unit.source: Gets or set the value that determines the appearance of a toolbar control and its buttons.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置值，该值确定工具栏控件及其按钮的外观。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="ToolBarAppearance.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="ToolBarAppearance.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A> property affects the appearance of the buttons assigned to the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A>属性会影响分配给工具栏的按钮的外观。

trans-unit.source: When the appearance is set to `ToolBarAppearance.Normal`, the toolbar's buttons appear three-dimensional and raised.
trans-unit.target: 当外观设置为`ToolBarAppearance.Normal`，三维和凸起将显示工具栏的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A> property of the toolbar to `ToolBarAppearance.Flat` to give the toolbar's buttons a flat appearance.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A>到工具栏的属性`ToolBarAppearance.Flat`赋予平面的外观的工具栏按钮。

trans-unit.source: As the mouse pointer moves over the flat buttons, they appear raised and three-dimensional.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针移到平面按钮时，它们显示引发和三维。

trans-unit.source: Separators on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance.Flat> appear as etched lines rather than spaces between the raised buttons.
trans-unit.target: 上的分隔符<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Appearance%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance.Flat>显示为刻的线而不是引发按钮之间的空格。

trans-unit.source: The flat style buttons give your application a more Web-like look.
trans-unit.target: 平面样式按钮使你的应用程序具有更类似于 Web 的外观。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>控件，设置它的一些常见属性，并将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: Delegates are also added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonDropDown> events.
trans-unit.target: 委托也将添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonDropDown>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> named `toolBar1` and an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> named `imageList1` have been declared.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>名为`toolBar1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>名为`imageList1`已声明。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarAppearance" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar adjusts its size automatically, based on the size of the buttons and the dock style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具栏是否根据按钮的大小和停靠样式自动调整其大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the toolbar adjusts its size automatically, based on the size of the buttons and dock style; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工具栏根据按钮大小和停靠样式自动调整其大小，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize%2A> is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control sizes itself to accommodate the toolbar buttons, based upon the button size, the number of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> objects it contains, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> of the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize%2A>设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>控件自行调整大小以适应工具栏按钮，基于该按钮的大小，数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>它包含的对象和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>工具栏。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control, sets some of its common properties, and adds it to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>控件，设置它的一些常见属性，并将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: Delegates are also added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonDropDown> events.
trans-unit.target: 委托也将添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonDropDown>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> named `toolBar1` and an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> named `imageList1` have been declared.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>名为`toolBar1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>名为`imageList1`已声明。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize" /> 属性的值更改后发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSizeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> named `ToolBar1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>名为`ToolBar1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSizeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置背景色。

trans-unit.source: The background color.
trans-unit.target: 背景色。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackColor" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackColor" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackColor%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackColorChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackColor%2A>属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackColorChanged>事件来检测更改。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置背景图像。

trans-unit.source: The background image.
trans-unit.target: 背景图像。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImage" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImage" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImage%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImageChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImage%2A>属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImageChanged>事件来检测更改。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the layout for background image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置背景图像的布局。

trans-unit.source: The layout for background image.
trans-unit.target: 背景图像的布局。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImageLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImageLayout" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImageLayoutChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.BackgroundImageLayoutChanged>事件来检测更改。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the toolbar control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工具栏控件的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="BorderStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="BorderStyle.None" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> can take on a sunken, three-dimensional appearance when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> property is set to `BorderStyle.Fixed3D`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>在凹陷的三维外观上可以执行时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>属性设置为`BorderStyle.Fixed3D`。

trans-unit.source: To display a flat thin border around the toolbar control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> property to `BorderStyle.FixedSingle`.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示在工具栏控件周围平面的细边框，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>属性`BorderStyle.FixedSingle`。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>控件，设置它的一些常见属性，并将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.target: 分配的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form.
trans-unit.target: 工具栏按钮分配给按钮集合，集合将分配到工具栏，而工具栏添加到窗体。

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick> event of the toolbar, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs> is evaluated, and the appropriate dialog box opened.
trans-unit.target: 上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonClick>事件工具栏上，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs.Button%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs>计算的值，并打开相应的对话框。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SaveFileDialog>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintDialog> have been created.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> controls assigned to the toolbar control.
trans-unit.target: 获取分配给工具栏控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> 控件集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection" /> that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection" /> 控件集合的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A> property is a zero-based indexed collection used to hold all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls assigned to the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Buttons%2A>属性是从零开始的索引的集合用来保存所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>分配给工具栏的控件。

trans-unit.source: Because the property is read-only, it can not be assigned a collection of toolbar buttons directly.
trans-unit.target: 因为该属性是只读的它不能被指派工具栏按钮的集合直接。

trans-unit.source: Toolbar buttons can be added or removed by using the methods inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 工具栏按钮可以添加或删除通过使用继承自方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>类。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A> method to add individual buttons and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A> method to delete a button.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Add%2A>方法将添加各个按钮和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Remove%2A>方法来删除一个按钮。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove all the buttons from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Clear%2A>方法从集合中移除所有的按钮。

trans-unit.target: 此代码需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>已创建。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the buttons on the toolbar control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工具栏控件上按钮的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> object that represents the size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> controls on the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 表示工具栏上 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 控件大小的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The default size has a width of 24 pixels and a height of 22 pixels, or large enough to accommodate the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> and text, whichever is greater.
trans-unit.target: 默认大小为宽 24 个像素、高 22 个像素，或足以容纳 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 和文本，取其中的较大者。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonSize%2A> is not set, it is set to its default.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ButtonSize%2A>未设置，它设置为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> is computed to accommodate the largest <xref:System.Drawing.Image> and text assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 或者，<xref:System.Drawing.Size>计算以适应最大<xref:System.Drawing.Image>和文本分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>控件。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Width" /> 对象的 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Size.Height" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 属性小于 0。

trans-unit.target: 获取此控件支持的默认输入法编辑器 (IME) 模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> class, this property always returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode.Disable?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: 在中实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>类，此属性始终返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode.Disable?displayProperty=nameWithType>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的默认大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> references.
trans-unit.target: 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar displays a divider.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具栏是否显示分隔符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the toolbar displays a divider; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工具栏显示分隔符，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Dividers are displayed to help distinguish the toolbar from adjacent controls, such as menus.
trans-unit.target: 分隔线将显示以帮助将工具栏与相邻的控件，如菜单区分开来。

trans-unit.source: A divider is displayed as a raised edge along the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 分隔符显示为凸起边缘沿顶部<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>控件。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置哪些控件边框停靠到其父控件并确定控件如何随其父级一起调整大小。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.None" />。

trans-unit.target: 此成员对于此控件无意义。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether drop-down buttons on a toolbar display down arrows.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具栏上的下拉按钮是否显示向下箭头。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if drop-down toolbar buttons display down arrows; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果下拉工具栏按钮显示向下箭头，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.DropDownArrows%2A> is set to `false`, no down arrows display on drop-down style toolbar buttons.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.DropDownArrows%2A>设置为`false`，没有向下箭头显示在下拉列表样式工具栏按钮。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the drop-down button on the toolbar, the menu drops down for selection.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击工具栏上的下拉列表按钮时，则在菜单下拉选择中。

trans-unit.source: When the drop-down arrow is displayed, the user must press the down arrow to display the menu.
trans-unit.target: 当显示下拉箭头时，用户必须按向下箭头以显示菜单。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工具栏按钮控件的可用图像集合。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.OnButtonClick%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.OnButtonClick%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.OnButtonClick(System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.OnButtonClick(System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.OnButtonClick(System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.OnButtonClick(System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonClickEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.OnFontChanged%2A> method resizes the toolbar buttons to fit the size of the new font.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.OnFontChanged%2A>方法调整大小以适应新字体的大小的工具栏按钮。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值，指定在定义控件的大小和位置时要使用的控件边界。

trans-unit.source: Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: 缩放控件的位置、大小、空白和边距。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" /> 控件的指定边界。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.SetBoundsCore%2A> method ignores width if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Dock%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Right> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.SetBoundsCore%2A>方法将忽略宽度，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Dock%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Right>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.SetBoundsCore%2A> ignores height if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Dock%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Top> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Bottom> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.SetBoundsCore%2A> 如果将忽略高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Dock%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Top>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Bottom>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.AutoSize%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar displays a ToolTip for each button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具栏是否显示每个按钮的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the toolbar display a ToolTip for each button; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果工具栏显示每个按钮的工具提示，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To set the text displayed by the ToolTip, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.ToolTipText%2A> property of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置由工具提示显示的文本，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.ToolTipText%2A>每个属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>。

trans-unit.source: To cause the ToolTip to display as the user moves the mouse pointer over the toolbar button, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ShowToolTips%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用户将鼠标指针移动到工具栏按钮时显示工具提示，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ShowToolTips%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> named `toolBar1` and an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> named `imageList1` have been declared.

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置工具栏的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text for the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 工具栏的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of text in relation to each image displayed on the toolbar button controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本与工具栏按钮控件上显示的每个图像的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarTextAlign" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarTextAlign" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="ToolBarTextAlign.Underneath" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="ToolBarTextAlign.Underneath" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Text%2A> can be aligned underneath or to the right of the image displayed on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Text%2A>下方或右侧的上显示的图像可以对齐<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>控件。

trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Text" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Text%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.TextChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Text%2A>属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.TextChanged>事件来检测更改。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" /> 控件的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A String that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar" /> 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToString%2A> method returns a string that includes the type, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>, and the string returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToString%2A> method of the toolbar’s first button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToString%2A>方法返回包含类型的值的字符串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection.Count%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToolBarButtonCollection>，并返回的字符串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.ToString%2A>工具栏的第一个按钮的方法。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的 Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 处理 Windows 消息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar buttons wrap to the next line if the toolbar becomes too small to display all the buttons on the same line.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如果工具栏太小以致无法在同一行显示所有按钮，工具栏按钮是否换到下一行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the toolbar buttons wrap to another line if the toolbar becomes too small to display all the buttons on the same line; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在工具栏太小以致无法在同一行内显示所有按钮时工具栏按钮换行，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Toolbar buttons can be divided into logical groups by using separators.
trans-unit.target: 可使用分隔符将工具栏按钮划分成多个逻辑组。

trans-unit.source: A separator is a toolbar button with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Style%2A> property set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`.
trans-unit.target: 分隔符是与工具栏按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton.Style%2A>属性设置为`ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Wrappable%2A> property is set to `true` and the toolbar becomes too small to display all the buttons on the same line, the toolbar is broken into additional lines, with the breaks occurring at the separators.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar.Wrappable%2A>属性设置为`true`和工具栏变得太小，无法在同一行显示所有按钮，工具栏分为更多行，具有发生分隔符分隔线。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that button groups stay together.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保按钮组保持在一起。

trans-unit.source: Toolbar buttons that are not in a group can be separated when the toolbar wraps.
trans-unit.target: 工具栏换行时，可以分隔不是组中的工具栏按钮。

trans-unit.source: The toolbar can become too small to display all its buttons on the same line if its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is resized.
trans-unit.target: 工具栏可能会变得太小，无法在同一行上显示所有按钮，如果其父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>一起调整大小。
